This module makes the variant matrix table header sticky.
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OCA/product-variant/14.0/product_matrix_sticky_header/static/img/screenshot.gif

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/product-variant/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/product-variant/issues/new?body=module:%20product_matrix_sticky_header%0Aversion:%2014.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
